column4: have anyone had the problem that when running the "install inside windows" function, you get the error: "Could not access cd, please make sure other applications are not using it..." and know how to fix it?
Try booting to the CD, and checking the CD for defects (its on the initial menu, and you won't have to actually boot Ubuntu).  That sometimes happens if somethign went wrong with the burn
or, if you want to assume its wrong, burn again at 4x
Try copying all the files off the CD to a folder (on your desktop or whatever) and then running wubi from there
